name: Michael Okonkwo
summary: Product Manager with 6 years of experience driving product strategy and execution for B2B SaaS platforms. Strong background in user research, data-driven decision making, and cross-functional team leadership.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
responsibilities: Own product roadmap for analytics platform serving 200+ enterprise customers
Led discovery and launch of AI-powered insights feature, increasing user engagement by 35%
Manage backlog and prioritize features based on customer feedback and business value
Collaborate with engineering, design, and sales teams to deliver quarterly releases
Conduct user interviews and usability testing to validate product hypotheses

experience.title: Product Manager
responsibilities: Managed payments processing product line generating $5M annual revenue
Defined product requirements and user stories for development team
Analyzed product metrics and user behavior using Mixpanel and SQL
Coordinated go-to-market strategy with marketing and sales teams

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
responsibilities: Supported senior PM in managing e-commerce platform features
Conducted competitive analysis and market research
Tracked KPIs and prepared executive presentations

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering
